brainly_data.question: MLA style is typically used by authors and students creating writing projects in which of the following areas? A. Medicine B. Humanities C. Mathematics D. Business
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.question: MLA style is typically used by authors and students creating writing projects in which of the following areas? A. Medicine B. Humanities C. Mathematics D. Business
all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text:
The answer is B. Humanities

Hope this helps :)
